text: Asa Guevara (born 20 December 1995) is a sprinter from Trinidad and Tobago specialising in the 400 metres. He represented his country at the 2018 World Indoor Championships reaching the semifinals. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2011 |CARIFTA Games (U17) |Montego Bay,
